channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Aspera Transfer Cluster Manager
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Aspera Transfer Cluster Manager

item.title: CVE-2020-4435|2024-09-16T22:57:12.113Z -- ibm -- aspera%20transfer%20cluster%20manager
item.description: Certain IBM Aspera applications are vulnerable to arbitrary memory corruption based on the product configuration, which could allow an attacker with intimate knowledge of the system to execute arbitrary code or perform a denial-of-service (DoS) through the http fallback service. IBM X-Force ID: 180901.
